keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, there were significant delays in attorney visitation at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, specifically for clients in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
A lawyer waited 2.5 hours to see a client in SHU but was ultimately unable to conduct the visit, indicating severe operational issues.
Supervisory Staff Attorney Brown proposed hardening attorney conference room #4 as a solution to alleviate the visitation delays.
